meanings.definition: A woman who makes a will.
meanings.sent1: The testatrices carefully planned their wills to ensure their wishes were carried out.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer met with the testatrices to discuss the details of their wills.
meanings.sent3: The testatrices joked about leaving all their belongings to their pets in their wills.
meanings.sent4: The testatrices' wills were like roadmaps guiding their loved ones after they were gone.
meanings.sent5: The testatrices' wills were as important as the keys to their homes.
